name: DDX49
description:
Far into the future in a nearby galaxy, two computer systems are at war.

As a last and desperate attempt to stay online, the Delta system has built the most sophisticated line of space fighters; the DDX49.

Operated by a human brain, the DDX49 is capable of completing surgical missions in deep enemy territory in ways that the hostile computer system is unlikely to predict.

Take control of the DDX49 fighter and combat the corrupted Lambda system. Utilize advanced flight capabilities and a wide variety of destructive weapons to tear apart the enemy.

DDX49 is at an early stage of development. Consider the current version a combat prototype.

Thank you!

*This is the official page for this title. Anywhere else where this title appears to be available is unofficial and I cannot guarantee that it is safe to download*.
